mapper.select:
select count(name) totlist from map
name like '%${findstr}%'
name like '%${findstr}%' and address='${sel}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO map(serial, name, price, doc, tim, address, place1, place2, pic) values(map_seq.nextval, '${name}', ${price}, '${doc}', '${tim}', '${address}', '${place1}', '${place2}', #{pic})
mapper.update: UPDATE MAP SET name= '${name}', price=${price}, doc='${doc}', tim='${tim}', address='${address}', place1='${place1}', place2='${place2}',pic='${pic}' WHERE serial='${serial}'
UPDATE MEMBER SET point = point - #{price} WHERE mid = #{reservationId}
update member set point = point + #{price} where mid = #{reservationId}
mapper.select: select serial, name, address, doc, tim, price, place1, place2,pic from map where serial = #{serial}
select serial, name, doc, tim, address, place1, place2, price,pic from map where serial = ${serial}
select pic from map where serial = #{serial}
SELECT point FROM MEMBER WHERE mid = #{_parameter}

select.if: SELECT d.reservationDay FROM RESERVATIONMONTH m LEFT JOIN RESERVATIONJan d ON m.STADIUMSERIAL = d.stadiumSerial WHERE m.RESERVATIONMONTH = d.reservationmonth and m.stadiumSerial = #{serial} order by TO_NUMBER(d.reservationDay)

SELECT d.reservationDay FROM RESERVATIONMONTH m LEFT JOIN RESERVATIONFeb d ON m.STADIUMSERIAL = d.stadiumSerial WHERE m.RESERVATIONMONTH = d.reservationmonth and m.stadiumSerial = #{serial} order by TO_NUMBER(d.reservationDay)

SELECT d.reservationDay FROM RESERVATIONMONTH m LEFT JOIN RESERVATIONMar d ON m.STADIUMSERIAL = d.stadiumSerial WHERE m.RESERVATIONMONTH = d.reservationmonth and m.stadiumSerial = #{serial} order by TO_NUMBER(d.reservationDay)

SELECT d.reservationDay FROM RESERVATIONMONTH m LEFT JOIN RESERVATIONApr d ON m.STADIUMSERIAL = d.stadiumSerial WHERE m.RESERVATIONMONTH = d.reservationmonth and m.stadiumSerial = #{serial} order by TO_NUMBER(d.reservationDay)

SELECT d.reservationDay FROM RESERVATIONMONTH m LEFT JOIN RESERVATIONMay d ON m.STADIUMSERIAL = d.stadiumSerial WHERE m.RESERVATIONMONTH = d.reservationmonth and m.stadiumSerial = #{serial} order by TO_NUMBER(d.reservationDay)

SELECT d.reservationDay FROM RESERVATIONMONTH m LEFT JOIN RESERVATIONJun d ON m.STADIUMSERIAL = d.stadiumSerial WHERE m.RESERVATIONMONTH = d.reservationmonth and m.stadiumSerial = #{serial} order by TO_NUMBER(d.reservationDay)

SELECT d.reservationDay FROM RESERVATIONMONTH m LEFT JOIN RESERVATIONJul d ON m.STADIUMSERIAL = d.stadiumSerial WHERE m.RESERVATIONMONTH = d.reservationmonth and m.stadiumSerial = #{serial} order by TO_NUMBER(d.reservationDay)

SELECT d.reservationDay FROM RESERVATIONMONTH m LEFT JOIN RESERVATIONAug d ON m.STADIUMSERIAL = d.stadiumSerial WHERE m.RESERVATIONMONTH = d.reservationmonth and m.stadiumSerial = #{serial} order by TO_NUMBER(d.reservationDay)

SELECT d.reservationDay FROM RESERVATIONMONTH m LEFT JOIN RESERVATIONSept d ON m.STADIUMSERIAL = d.stadiumSerial WHERE m.RESERVATIONMONTH = d.reservationmonth and m.stadiumSerial = #{serial} order by TO_NUMBER(d.reservationDay)

SELECT d.reservationDay FROM RESERVATIONMONTH m LEFT JOIN RESERVATIONOct d ON m.STADIUMSERIAL = d.stadiumSerial WHERE m.RESERVATIONMONTH = d.reservationmonth and m.stadiumSerial = #{serial} order by TO_NUMBER(d.reservationDay)

SELECT d.reservationDay FROM RESERVATIONMONTH m LEFT JOIN RESERVATIONNov d ON m.STADIUMSERIAL = d.stadiumSerial WHERE m.RESERVATIONMONTH = d.reservationmonth and m.stadiumSerial = #{serial} order by TO_NUMBER(d.Day)

SELECT d.reservationDay FROM RESERVATIONMONTH m LEFT JOIN RESERVATIONDec d ON m.STADIUMSERIAL = d.stadiumSerial WHERE m.RESERVATIONMONTH = d.reservationmonth and m.stadiumSerial = #{serial} order by TO_NUMBER(d.reservationDay)

mapper.select:
SELECT count(reservationId) FROM RESERVATIONRECORD
where RESERVATIONID = #{reservationId}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Record WHERE stadiumSerial= #{serial} AND reservationMonth = #{reservationMonth} AND reservationDay = #{reservationDay} AND reservationTime = #{reservationTime} AND reservationId = #{reservationId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(STADIUMSERIAL) FROM RECORD WHERE STADIUMSERIAL = #{_parameter}
